name: Sewer Scavenger Cache
description: A dank, fog-choked labyrinth beneath Rustmarket, where the sewers twist into a maze of crumbling tunnels. The air is thick with the stench of decay and the faint glow of fog-touched moss. Scavengers hoard stolen relics here, their erratic movements echoing through the dripping chambers.

stages.description: The sewerâ€™s entrance, slick with slime and littered with broken crates. Fog-touched scavengers skulk in the shadows, clutching makeshift weapons and glowing plant vials.
A flooded chamber where the fog swirls thickly, obscuring rusted traps. Scavengers, emboldened by fog-plants, guard a pile of stolen goods, while rats dart between their feet.

The cache vault, a cavernous chamber lit by glowing portal shards. A seasoned scavenger leader, hopped up on psychoactive plants, commands a pack of frenzied followers and their trained rats, defending the tapestry fragment.
